The Boy with Balloon Hands - In a city plagued by a series of bizarre occurrences, the Boy with Balloon Hands must use his special abilities to uncover the truth behind a mysterious balloon-filled phenomenon, discovering an otherworldly force that holds the key to his own destiny.

The Boy with Balloon Hands and the Great Balloon Heist - A group of thieves plan to steal valuable balloon-like objects from a museum, unaware of the Boy with Balloon Hands, who uses his powers to stop their daring heist and save the day.

The Boy with Balloon Hands and the Balloon Forest - The Boy with Balloon Hands embarks on a quest to save the endangered balloon animals that inhabit the beautiful but fragile Balloon Forest, learning the importance of conservation and the interconnectedness of nature.

The Boy with Balloon Hands and the Balloon of Power - Discovered by a shady organization, the Boy with Balloon Hands is forced into their plans for world domination, fighting to resist the temptation of power while learning the true value of friendship and bravery.

The Boy with Balloon Hands and the Balloon Expedition - Along with a group of like-minded children, the Boy with Balloon Hands embarks on a thrilling adventure to explore a long-lost balloon-filled city, uncovering its secrets and learning the importance of exploring the unknown.
